mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gathering (gathering_leader_id, gathering_name, gathering_description) values (#{gatheringLeaderId}, #{gatheringName}, #{gatheringDescription})

INSERT INTO gathering_payment_rule (gathering_id, payment_amount, payment_day, start_date, payment_cycle_code) values (#{gatheringId}, #{paymentAmount}, #{paymentDay}, #{startDate}, #{paymentCycleCode})
INSERT INTO gathering_member (gathering_id, member_id, member_name) values (#{gatheringId}, #{memberId}, #{memberName})
mapper.select: SELECT g.* FROM gathering_member gm JOIN gathering g ON gm.gathering_id = g.gathering_id WHERE gm.member_id = #{memberId}
